summary: 13-year-old Sam Steele Jr. forms his own private detective agency to emulate his father, Des Moines detective Sam Steele, and helps track down a jewel thief.

keywords: private detective|thief|13 year old|first part|boy detective
title: Sam Steele and the Junior Detective Agency
